Room.Name: Highland Avenue/Kafkan Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Highland Avenue and Kafkan Way.
Room.LongDescription: The City Walls make a turn towards the north and the west, running parallel to both Highland Avenue and Kafkan Way. A lone Guard Tower stands on the southeastern corner of the intersection, watching over and protecting the town from various invaders from the mountains and plains. It has been a long time since the city was last attacked, but as soon as the guard slacks, invaders will probably attack again.
